Table of Contents

Class TextureStore

Namespace
osu.Framework.Graphics.Textures
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

Provides drawable-ready Textures sourced from any number of provided sources (via constructor parameter or AddTextureSource(IResourceStore<TextureUpload>)).

public class TextureStore : ITextureStore, IResourceStore<Texture>, IDisposable

TextureStore(IRenderer, IResourceStore<TextureUpload>, bool, TextureFilteringMode, bool, float) 

public TextureStore(IRenderer renderer, IResourceStore<TextureUpload> store = null, bool useAtlas = true, TextureFilteringMode filteringMode = TextureFilteringMode.Linear, bool manualMipmaps = false, float scaleAdjust = 2)

manualMipmaps bool

Fields

Atlas 

protected TextureAtlas Atlas

Field Value

TextureAtlas

ScaleAdjust

Decides at what resolution multiple this TextureStore is providing sprites at. ie. if we are providing high resolution (at 2x the resolution of standard 1366x768) sprites this should be 2.

public readonly float ScaleAdjust

Field Value

float

Methods

AddStore(ITextureStore)

Adds a nested texture store to use during Texture lookup if not found in this store.

public virtual void AddStore(ITextureStore store)

Parameters

store ITextureStore

The store to add.

Remarks

Of note, nested stores will use their own sources and not include any sources added via AddTextureSource(IResourceStore<TextureUpload>).

AddTextureSource(IResourceStore<TextureUpload>)

Adds a texture data lookup source to load Textures with.

public virtual void AddTextureSource(IResourceStore<TextureUpload> store)

Parameters

store IResourceStore<TextureUpload>

The store to add.

Remarks

Lookup sources can be implemented easily using a TextureLoaderStore to provide the final TextureUpload.
